data.name: Selenon Rising - Episode 2
data.detailed_description:
Episode 2 of Selenon Rising continues the story that began in Episode 1.

With her faith in the Bureau shaken, Violet decides to make a dangerous alliance. When a critical mission is hindered by corruption within the Bureau, her new allies may be her only hope of solving the case successfully. But, are they truly to be trusted, or is she just walking into a trap from which there is no escape? And, could there be an even more dangerous force lurking in the shadows?

Features


* Similar in length to Episode 1
* More investigations and interrogations of crime scenes and suspects
* New characters and music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP1
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Chipset
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Chipset
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Chipset
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
